response.overview: Struggling to survive in post-WWI Copenhagen, a newly unemployed and pregnant young woman is taken in by a charismatic elder to help run an underground adoption agency. The two form an unexpected bond, until a sudden discovery changes everything.
response.title: The Girl with the Needle

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
